title: WTB - T206 Polar Bear Cobb, Matty, Johnson or Young PSA/SGC 3-4.
author: DeanH3

posts.post_title: WTB - T206 Polar Bear Cobb, Matty, Johnson or Young PSA/SGC 3-4.
posts.post_content:
Looking to add a T206 Polar Bear Cobby, Matty, Johnson or Young.

Centering top and corners least priority. Want to avoid creases if possible. Would also consider a 2 if it had strong eye appeal. Let me know if you have anything. Thanks in advance.
